bug.short_desc: Application wont start because of missing 'glade' module
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Application doesn't start.
Steps to Reproduce: 1. install package on vanilla system 2. run in terminal
Actual results: Error: unable to find module glade
Additional info: Should depend on pygtk2-libglade. Installing the package pygtk2-libglade fixes the issue.

Hi,
I just pushed a new version in fedora testing repository, did you try it to see if it solve your issue?
Thanks,
Sorry, I didn't enable the updates-testing repo. After doing so, the dependency is recognized correctly. I think this bug can be considered fixed.
Thanks for checking out, I will push the update to stable as soon as the system let me do it!
